languages.text: {n}Прическа благородной дамы растрепалась, корсаж испачкался в пыли, а маска неуклюже задрана на лоб. Высоко подняв юбку, она штурмует дверь под охраной стражи.{/n} "Пустите, Троном прошу!"{n} — восклицает девушка, когда ее в очередной раз оттесняют в сторону.{/n}

{n}The young noblewoman's hair is dishevelled, her bodice stained with grime, and her mask pushed clumsily on top of her head. Holding her skirt high, she is trying her hardest to fight her way through the guards blocking the door.{/n} "Just let me go, please, for Throne's sake!" {n}she exclaims when the guards yet again push her aside.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Прическа благородной дамы растрепалась, корсаж испачкался в пыли, а маска неуклюже задрана на лоб. Высоко подняв юбку, она штурмует дверь под охраной стражи.{/n} "Пустите, Троном прошу!"{n} — восклицает девушка, когда ее в очередной раз оттесняют в сторону.{/n}

{n}The young noblewoman's hair is dishevelled, her bodice stained with grime, and her mask pushed clumsily on top of her head. Holding her skirt high, she is trying her hardest to fight her way through the guards blocking the door.{/n} "Just let me go, please, for Throne's sake!" {n}she exclaims when the guards yet again push her aside.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这位年轻的贵妇人头发蓬乱，胸衣上满是污渍，面具笨拙地戴在头上。她将裙角高高抬起，竭尽全力想从堵在门口的守卫之间挤过去。{/n}“黄金王座在上，求求你们，放我走吧！”{n}守卫再次把她推到了一旁，她惊叫起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The young noblewoman's hair is dishevelled, her bodice stained with grime, and her mask pushed clumsily on top of her head. Holding her skirt high, she is trying her hardest to fight her way through the guards blocking the door.{/n} "Just let me go, please, for Throne's sake!" {n}she exclaims when the guards yet again push her aside.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这位年轻的贵妇人头发蓬乱，胸衣上满是污渍，面具笨拙地戴在头上。她将裙角高高抬起，竭尽全力想从堵在门口的守卫之间挤过去。{/n}“黄金王座在上，求求你们，放我走吧！”{n}守卫再次把她推到了一旁，她惊叫起来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}若い貴婦人の髪は乱れ、胴衣は汚れで染まり、仮面は不格好に頭の上へずり上げられていた。スカートを高く持ち上げながら、彼女は扉を塞ぐ衛兵たちの間を必死に押し通ろうとしていた。{/n}「帰らせて！玉座に誓ってお願い！」{n}衛兵たちにまたしても押しのけられながら、彼女は叫んだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The young noblewoman's hair is dishevelled, her bodice stained with grime, and her mask pushed clumsily on top of her head. Holding her skirt high, she is trying her hardest to fight her way through the guards blocking the door.{/n} "Just let me go, please, for Throne's sake!" {n}she exclaims when the guards yet again push her aside.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}若い貴婦人の髪は乱れ、胴衣は汚れで染まり、仮面は不格好に頭の上へずり上げられていた。スカートを高く持ち上げながら、彼女は扉を塞ぐ衛兵たちの間を必死に押し通ろうとしていた。{/n}「帰らせて！玉座に誓ってお願い！」{n}衛兵たちにまたしても押しのけられながら、彼女は叫んだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La joven noble tiene el cabello desaliñado, el corpiño sucio y la máscara colocada torpemente sobre la cabeza. Se sujeta la falda con ambas manos mientras trata por todos los medios de abrirse paso a través de los guardias que bloquean la puerta.{/n} «¡Por favor, por el amor del Trono, dejad que me vaya!», {n}exclama cuando los guardias la apartan por enésima vez.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The young noblewoman's hair is dishevelled, her bodice stained with grime, and her mask pushed clumsily on top of her head. Holding her skirt high, she is trying her hardest to fight her way through the guards blocking the door.{/n} "Just let me go, please, for Throne's sake!" {n}she exclaims when the guards yet again push her aside.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La joven noble tiene el cabello desaliñado, el corpiño sucio y la máscara colocada torpemente sobre la cabeza. Se sujeta la falda con ambas manos mientras trata por todos los medios de abrirse paso a través de los guardias que bloquean la puerta.{/n} «¡Por favor, por el amor del Trono, dejad que me vaya!», {n}exclama cuando los guardias la apartan por enésima vez.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Genç soylunun saçı başı dağılmış, elbisesi çamura batmış, maskesi ise itiş kakıştan başından kaymış vaziyette. Eteğinin ucundan tutarak geçmesini engelleyen muhafızlarla gücü yettiğince mücadele ediyor.{/n} "Taht aşkına, bırakın gideyim!" {n}Muhafızlar tarafından bir kez daha itilince feryat ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The young noblewoman's hair is dishevelled, her bodice stained with grime, and her mask pushed clumsily on top of her head. Holding her skirt high, she is trying her hardest to fight her way through the guards blocking the door.{/n} "Just let me go, please, for Throne's sake!" {n}she exclaims when the guards yet again push her aside.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Genç soylunun saçı başı dağılmış, elbisesi çamura batmış, maskesi ise itiş kakıştan başından kaymış vaziyette. Eteğinin ucundan tutarak geçmesini engelleyen muhafızlarla gücü yettiğince mücadele ediyor. Muhafızlar tarafından bir kez daha itilince feryat ediyor. {/n} "Taht aşkına, bırakın gideyim!"

languages.text: {n}La jeune noble est décoiffée, son corsage est crasseux et son masque est maladroitement relevé sur le sommet de son crâne. Soulevant sa jupe, elle s'efforce de se frayer un passage à travers les gardes qui défendent la porte.{/n} « Par le Trône, je vous en prie, laissez-moi partir ! » {n}s'exclame-t-elle lorsque les gardes la repoussent à nouveau.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The young noblewoman's hair is dishevelled, her bodice stained with grime, and her mask pushed clumsily on top of her head. Holding her skirt high, she is trying her hardest to fight her way through the guards blocking the door.{/n} "Just let me go, please, for Throne's sake!" {n}she exclaims when the guards yet again push her aside.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La jeune noble est décoiffée, son corsage est crasseux et son masque est maladroitement relevé sur le sommet de son crâne. Soulevant sa jupe, elle s'efforce de se frayer un passage à travers les gardes qui défendent la porte.{/n} « Par le Trône, je vous en prie, laissez-moi partir ! » {n}s'exclame-t-elle lorsque les gardes la repoussent à nouveau.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Haare der jungen Adeligen sind zerzaust, ihr Mieder ist verdreckt, und ihre Maske sitzt unbeholfen auf ihrem Kopf. Sie hält ihren Rock hoch und versucht nach Kräften, sich durch die Wachen zu schieben, die die Tür versperren.{/n} "Lasst mich bitte einfach gehen, beim Thron!", {n}ruft sie aus, als die Wachen sie erneut zur Seite schieben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The young noblewoman's hair is dishevelled, her bodice stained with grime, and her mask pushed clumsily on top of her head. Holding her skirt high, she is trying her hardest to fight her way through the guards blocking the door.{/n} "Just let me go, please, for Throne's sake!" {n}she exclaims when the guards yet again push her aside.{/n}
